edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter

Class LocalBackgroundEstimationFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.Filter
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.LocalBackgroundEstimationFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalBackgroundEstimation3DFilter

    public class LocalBackgroundEstimationFilter
extends Filter
    A Filter that estimates the background locally in an Image, using a local median filtering approach.

    This filter may be useful for determining and correcting for local intensity variations.

    The reference image should be set to the Image that is to be median filtered. This Image will not be changed.

    The argument to the apply method should be any Image (except a shallow copy of the reference Image) of the same dimensions as the reference Image. The median filtered Image will be written to this Image.

    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

      • setBoxSize

        public void setBoxSize(int boxSize)
        Sets the size of the box used for local median calculations.
        Parameters:
        boxSize - The radius of the box (the final box will be 2*boxSize + 1 square).

      • apply

        public void apply(Image im)
        Applies the LocalBackgroundEstimationFilter to an Image.
        Specified by:
        apply in class Filter
        Parameters:
        im - The Image that will be replaced by the output Image. This can be anything of the correct dimensions except a shallow copy of the reference Image.

      • quickFindKth

        public static double quickFindKth(int k,
                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector toFind)
        Finds the kth item sorted by increasing value in a possibly unsorted vector.

        This will likely not completely sort the vector, but will almost certainly change the order of the items in the vector in place.

        Parameters:
        k - The index of the item (in the sorted vector) to find.
        toFind - The RealVector in which to find the kth item.
        Returns:
        The value of the kth item (in the sorted vector).
